0.name: Gauntlet of Clicking
0.description: A rare glove used by the previous King, it was thought to be long lost before coming into your possession.

1.name: Iron Sword
1.description: A standard issue sword given to new mercenarys. It has no special features and is very dull.

2.name: Old Pants
2.description: An old pair of pants which are not good for anything besides offering a small boost to their wearer.

3.name: Berserk Potion
3.description: An extremely precious, and forbiddon, potion which enrages anyone who uses even one drop.

4.name: The Last Ring
4.description: This ring is unknown in its making, but we do know that it is an extremely powerful item.

5.name: Forbidden Scroll
5.description: A scroll which contains a forbidden tap technique used by the wizard king.

6.name: Power Axe
6.description: A powerful axe which can destroy even the mightest defence.

7.name: Spell Tome
7.description: Spell tome which contains a variety of legendary spells.

8.name: Bracers
8.description: Old bracers worn by a previous mercenary. It has limited defence capability.

9.name: Lucky Gem
9.description: A precious stone which boosts the wielders luck. Previous users were all blessed with fortune.

10.name: Jade Necklace
10.description: A jade necklace which offers fortune to its user.
